values: To arrest someone means to catch that person for doing something bad.
The man was arrested for breaking the law.
v. to use the power of the law to take and keep 逮捕
v. to stop the progress or movement of 阻止
v. to attract and hold the attention of 吸引
n. 逮捕；监禁 vt. 逮捕；阻止；吸引
